question1.q: Can I change plans at any time?
question1.a: Yes, you can upgrade or change your plan at any time. Changes apply immediately and you only pay the prorated difference.

question2.q: What happens if I exceed my query limit?
question2.a: We'll notify you when you approach your limit. You can choose to upgrade your plan or purchase additional query packages as needed.

question3.q: Do you offer discounts for non-profit organizations?
question3.a: Yes, we offer special discounts for non-profit and educational organizations. Contact us to learn more details.

question4.q: Does the free trial require a credit card?
question4.a: No, you can start your 14-day free trial without needing to enter payment information. You only need to create an account.
